SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SEQ)+1)),'1') FROM CLIENT_INFO
INSERT INTO CLIENT_INFO (SEQ, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, TRAVE_CITY, PERIOD, EXPEND, TRANSPORT, EST_EXPEND, RENT_EXPEND,IS_REQUESTED) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{traveCity}, #{period}, #{expend}, #{transport},'0', TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(#{rentExpend}), 'FM999,999,999'),'N' )

BEGIN UPDATE CLIENT_INFO SET EST_EXPEND = #{estExpend}, IS_REQUESTED = 'N' WHERE SEQ = #{seq}; DELETE FROM TRAVE_INFO WHERE SEQ = #{seq}; INSERT ALL INTO TRAVE_INFO ( TRAVE_SEQ, SEQ, TRAVE_DAY, TRAVE_TIME, TRAVE_CITY, TRAVE_COUNTY, TRAVE_LOC, TRAVE_TRANS, TRANS_TIME, USE_TIME, USE_EXPEND, TRAVE_DETAIL, REQUEST, TRAVE_FARE )
SELECT #{trave.traveSeq} AS TRAVE_SEQ, #{seq} AS SEQ, #{trave.traveDay} AS TRAVE_DAY, #{trave.traveTime} AS TRAVE_TIME, #{trave.traveCity} AS TRAVE_CITY, #{trave.traveCounty} AS TRAVE_COUNTY, #{trave.traveLoc} AS TRAVE_LOC, #{trave.traveTrans} AS TRAVE_TRANS, #{trave.transTime} AS TRANS_TIME, #{trave.useTime} AS USE_TIME, #{trave.useExpend} AS USE_EXPEND, #{trave.traveDetail} AS TRAVE_DETAIL, #{trave.request} AS REQUEST, #{trave.traveFare} AS TRAVE_FARE FROM DUAL END;
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, TRAVE_CITY, PERIOD, EXPEND, TRANSPORT, EST_EXPEND, RENT_EXPEND, IS_REQUESTED FROM CLIENT_INFO ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SEQ) DESC

SELECT C.SEQ, C.USER_NAME, C.USER_PHONE, C.TRAVE_CITY, C.PERIOD, C.EXPEND, C.TRANSPORT, C.EST_EXPEND, C.RENT_EXPEND, C.IS_REQUESTED, T.TRAVE_SEQ, T.SEQ, T.TRAVE_DAY, T.TRAVE_TIME, T.TRAVE_CITY, T.TRAVE_COUNTY, T.TRAVE_LOC, T.TRAVE_TRANS, T.TRANS_TIME, T.USE_TIME, T.USE_EXPEND, T.TRAVE_DETAIL, T.REQUEST, T.TRAVE_FARE FROM CLIENT_INFO C LEFT JOIN TRAVE_INFO T ON C.SEQ = T.SEQ WHERE C.SEQ = #{param} ORDER BY T.TRAVE_SEQ ASC
